title: NTPC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 20 Physician Posts
description: The National Thermal Power Corporation (NTPC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 20 Physician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD, DNB can grab this chance and apply for the NTPC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interestd and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more detai...
